page.title: 08SOCIAL CONCERNS West Forres
page.content: The main issues in the local newspapers for one week(the second in June) were the proposed Fine Fare Supermarket and the new Forres By-Pass.The By-Pass proposed to start in 1986 is creating a lot of worry because objectors may delay the starting date.The Fine Fare application has been refused by the planners even though there is massive support from the public.The proposed building site is out of the town centre and two years ago it was decided that there should be no trading on out of centre sites.The editor's letter page was packed with letters in favour of Fine Fare although one suggests the damage it could do to small traders.Others in favour are saying that the small shops are too little for people to shop comfortably.
